import { useState } from "react"; import GPS from "../components/gps"; import Styles from "../components/styles"; import lang from "../components/language"; import { Container, Row, Col } from 'react-grid-system'; export default () => { const [currLang, setCurrLang] = useState("english"); return
{lang[currLang].header.OurMission} {lang[currLang].header.Terms}

{lang[currLang].title}

{lang[currLang].subtitle}: Israel

{lang[currLang].mission_section.title}

{lang[currLang].mission_section.p1}

{lang[currLang].mission_section.p2}

CoronaForms {lang[currLang].mission_section.p3}

 CoronaForms.org {new Date().getFullYear()} - {lang[currLang].footer.MadeWithLoveInIsrael}
}
